entries.meaning: A solid disk or cylinder that fits inside a hollow cylinder, and moves under pressure (as in an engine) or displaces fluid (as in a pump)
(music) A valve device in some brass instruments for changing the pitch

verbs.description: piston (third-person singular simple present pistons, present participle pistoning, simple past and past participle pistoned)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To move up and down or in and out like a piston.
